comment.author: 67127882@N07
comment._content:
At the Tanganyika Constitutional Conference held in the Karimjee Hall, Dar es Salaam from 27 to 29 March 1961.  Nearest the camera is Mr B E Rolfe, of the Colonial Office, then
 Mr W B L Monson, Under-Secretary of State at the Colonial Office, then the Rt. Hon Iain Macleod, MP, Secretary of State for the Colonies, speaking to Mr A J Chant, the Conference Secretary,
